00063 //----------------------------------------------------------
00064 void
00065 MOBox::GetCorners( MVec3* corners ) const
00066 {
00068         MVec3 center;
00069         MVec3 pxAxis;
00070         MVec3 pyAxis;
00071         MVec3 pzAxis;
00072         _transform.GetTranslate( center );
00073         _transform.GetAxis( pxAxis, 0 );
00074         _transform.GetAxis( pyAxis, 1 );
00075         _transform.GetAxis( pzAxis, 2 );
00076 
00077         pxAxis *= _halfExts.GetX();
00078         pyAxis *= _halfExts.GetY();
00079         pzAxis *= _halfExts.GetZ();
00080         MVec3 nxAxis = -pxAxis;
00081         MVec3 nyAxis = -pyAxis;
00082         MVec3 nzAxis = -pzAxis;
00083 
00084         corners[ 0 ] = center + nxAxis + nyAxis + nzAxis;
00085         corners[ 1 ] = center + nxAxis + nyAxis + pzAxis;
00086         corners[ 2 ] = center + nxAxis + pyAxis + nzAxis;
00087         corners[ 3 ] = center + nxAxis + pyAxis + pzAxis;
00088         corners[ 4 ] = center + pxAxis + nyAxis + nzAxis;
00089         corners[ 5 ] = center + pxAxis + nyAxis + pzAxis;
00090         corners[ 6 ] = center + pxAxis + pyAxis + nzAxis;
00091         corners[ 7 ] = center + pxAxis + pyAxis + pzAxis;
00092 }
